titleStmt.title: Note by Mǝslena ʾƎgzi’: sǝyum Dabr Mā‘ṣo
CCR 9

editionStmt.p: The encoding was carried out by Nafisa Valieva thanks to the project HornEast https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/726206 that has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (Grant agreement No. 726206).

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

abstract.p: This document, number nine in Carlo Conti Rossini's edition (and therefore CCR 9 according to Bausi's reference). It is attested only once as added document at the end of the Gospel of John. It was photographed by Roger Schneider.

div.ab:
በአኰቴተ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ። ወሀብኩ፡
አነ፡ ምስሌነ፡ እግዚእ፡ ስመ፡ ልደትየ፡ ወሰንየ፡ ሐረሳይ፡ ሥዩ
ም፡ ይብር፡ ማዕጸ፡ በመዋዕለ፡ ይርድአነ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ብፁዕ፡ ወ
ብእሲቱ፡ ወደቂቁ፡ ወበኀያል፡ ዔ፡ ሰብእ፡ በመዋዕለ፡ ድላንዳ፡ ን
ጉሥ፡ በወርኀ፡ መጋቢት፡ አመ፡ ፲ወ፪፡ በበ፪ወ፪፡ ዓመተ፡ ም
ሕረት፡ እመቦ፡ ዘተአገሎ፡ ለመጣዕ፡ ውጉዘ፡ ለይኩን፡ በስማይ፡
ወበምድር፡ በቅድመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡
ከመ፡ ይትወሐሰኒ፡ በመንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም
አሜን።።
